name: Progbots!
description:
Animated intro scene for the start of a paint game.

Goal of game would be: paint fences in a predetermined pattern as quick as possible (beat target to pass level)

Difficulties to the game: character movement & pattern memorization

None of this is implemented, just the animated video. Characters/objects in the render are all available. Reach out to me if you'd like to use them for anything. The paint rollers can obviously be replaced by something else.
